title: Is there a way to change Summoner name to the champions name ingame?
body: In the midst of a team fight its sometimes confusing to identify who is who. So i was wondering if there is a way to make it so it display the champion names instead of the summoner names above the champions.

replies.body: You can turn on colour-blind mode, that way your health bar will be a more distinct yellow compared to the other team/players.
